## checkType variable

检查目标对象类型

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

    validType: (t: string) => boolean;
    customValid: (cb: (t: string) => boolean) => boolean;
    isString: boolean;
    isNumber: boolean;
    isBoolean: boolean;
    isObject: boolean;
    isArray: boolean;
    isArrayBuffer: boolean;
    isFormData: boolean;
    isDate: boolean;

    isUndefined: boolean;
    isMap: boolean;

    isWeakMap: boolean;
    isWeakSet: boolean;

    isArguments: boolean;
    isElement: boolean;
    isBuffer: boolean;
    isError: boolean;
    isRegExp: boolean;
    isSymbol: boolean;
    isNullish: boolean;
    isBasics: boolean;
    isFinite: boolean;
    isSafeInteger: boolean;
}
```
